text: Koh Rong () is a coastal town in Preah Sihanouk Province of Cambodia. It was formed from the islands of Koh Rong and Koh Rong Sanloem by a sub-decree issued in January 2019. It has a population of around 4,000. ==References== Category:2019 establishments in Asia Category:Populated places in Sihanoukville Province Category:Cities in Cambodia Category:Islands of Cambodia Category:Sihanoukville (city) Category:Populated places established in 2019
title: Koh Rong (town)
